Detailed Description

Very simple class/macro for profiling stuff... Just use it like:

       mr::timer t1;
       // ... stuff to profile goes here...
       t1.stop();
   
       mr::timer t2;
       // ... stuff to profile goes here...
       t2.stop();
   
       if ( t1 < t2 ) mi_info("t1 is faster");
       else mi_info("t2 is faster");
